name: vRhythm
description: vRhythm is a music rhythm game for VR, where you play the drums. Every song in the game is handmade so the songs are perfectly synced with the music, and it allows importing songs from osu!mania and stepmania.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: CPU: Intel i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 Storage: 500 MB available space
